name: .VBD File Extension
summary: Learn about .VBD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: ActiveX file, also called an "Active Document," created with Microsoft Visual Basic; often hosted on Web servers and can be accessed with a Web browser.

content: VBD files may require specific ActiveX components to run. If the necessary files are not installed, Internet Explorer users will be directed to the appropriate download page on Microsoft's website.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
